name: Airport Administrator Simulator
description:
What is it like to be employed at an airport? In Airport Administrator Simulator you have the chance to know the smallest details of how a big airport works. Moreover, you will interact with customers and you will decide the fate of whether the plane flies or not.
Game features :
- More than 8 departmens ( hospital , restaurant , customs ) to manage
- Checking documents, luggage and completing tickets
- Patient care by providing first aid
